title: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot – Deluxe Edition – v1.60 + 8 DLCs
body:
Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot – Deluxe Edition – v1.60 + 8 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Third-person, 3D
Companies: CyberConnect2, Bandai Namco Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI15
Original Size: 36 GB
Repack Size: from 28.5 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Dragon.Ball.Z.Kakarot.Trunks.The.Warrior.of.Hope-CODEX ISO release: codex-dragon.ball.z.kakarot.trunks.the.warrior.of.hope.iso (38,707,167,232 bytes)
  • 8 DLCs are included and activated; Game version is v1.60
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (only when installed with both voiceover packs)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of either English or Japanese voiceovers
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 36 to 28.5~29.9 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~13 minutes on 16-threads CPU; ~22 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~40 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 38.4 GB
  • Use “Language Changer.bat” in game root to change the game GUI language
  • Audio language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Relive the story of Goku and other Z Fighters in DRAGON BALL Z: KAKAROT! Beyond the epic battles, experience life in the DRAGON BALL Z world as you fight, fish, eat, and train with Goku, Gohan, Vegeta and others. Explore the new areas and adventures as you advance through the story and form powerful bonds with other heroes from the DRAGON BALL Z universe.

Included DLCs

  • A NEW POWER AWAKENS SET (Includes Part 1 + Part 2)
  • Aged Wild Steak
  • Dragon Palace Bowl
  • MUSIC COMPILATION PACK
  • Pre-Order DLC Pack
  • Steaming-Hot Grilled Fish
  • Tao Pai Pai Pillar
  • TRUNKS THE WARRIOR OF HOPE

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is HEAVILY backwards compatible with my previous DBZK repack. You can rehash fg-01.bin and save 21.5 GB of traffic.
